H3.text: what business did andrew carnegie dominate. U.S. Steel

A4.text: Carnegie Steel Company was formed in 1892 and sold in 1901 to U.S. Steel.

A5.text: The sale of Carnegie Steel Company made Carnegie one of the richest Americans in history.
